messages.title: Living safely in Ealing Southall
messages.content: Labour in government will halt the damage of austerity everywhere. We have realistic commitments to recruiting thousands of police personnel and focus on the real issues by taking people out of police administration.

messages.title: I want to see opportunities for everyone locally
messages.content: I've lived here for over 50 years, I first moved to Harnwell in 1968, and still have a close connection to the area.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will start a Green Industrial Revolution that includes offshore wind and carbon capture, and ensure the UK achieves the reduction of emissions.
Labour will ensure that utilities are under public ownership, run by and for the public, not for profit.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Education for the many not the few
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will fund free school meals for all primary school children, reduce class sizes, and provide more funding for schools. They plan to provide lifelong learning by offering six years of free education for adults.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour will prevent a damaging Tory no-deal Brexit, give people a final say, back a credible option of a deal alongside a remain option.
issues.education: Fund free school meals for all primary school children, reduce class sizes, and more funding for schools.
issues.environment: Labour will tackle the climate crisis with a Green Industrial Revolution.
issues.governance: The Tories have created a crisis of law and order.
issues.health: Return Ealing Hospital services which were stolen.

housing.content: Labour's government will build more new homes and deliver zero-hours contracts.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived here for over 50 years, I first moved to Harnwell in 1968, and still have a strong bond to the area.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for Ealing, Southall

endorsements.endorsement: Virendra is a great Remainder and I am delighted he voted against the regressive Article 50, he is the kind of active and caring MP we need, re-elect him.
Virendra and Labour have a real plan to invest in education and young people, I hope you all vote for him to support the next generation.
The NHS needs a Labour Government and a local champion like Virendra. I am proud he represents us, and I urge everyone to vote for him!

quotes.text: "Virendra is a great Remainder and I am delighted he voted against the regressive Article 50, he is the kind of active and caring MP we need, re-elect him."
"Virendra and Labour have a real plan to invest in education and young people, I hope you all vote for him to support the next generation."
"The NHS needs a Labour Government and a local champion like Virendra. I am proud he represents us, and I urge everyone to vote for him!"

images.caption: Re-elect Virendra Sharma - Your Labour Candidate for Ealing, Southall

leaflet.additionalNotes: Virendra Sharma is focused on local opportunities, living safety in Ealing Southall, and has promises about past and future.
